data.name: Santa's Conveyor Chaos
data.description:
December event is live! Read post below for details.

Ho Ho Ho! It's Santa here, and I've got a big Christmas challenge for you! My workshop's a bit of a mess, and presents are popping out all over the place â€” right into your house!

You'll grab gifts from moving belts and pack them as fast as you can. It's simple: gifts come in, you pack them up, and together we make sure Christmas is ready to go!

The game is easy to play but can get pretty zippy, like reindeer on a gingerbread sugar rush. But hey, that's part of the fun! It's all about quick hands, a sharp eye, and a heart full of holiday spirit.

No scores, no timers, just you saving the day one gift at a time. There's also a personal gift shop for you to treat yourself to some home decoration, like a lovely Christmas tree! So, what do you say? Grab your Quest and make some room â€” let's see those present-packing skills in action!

Cheers and chuckles,
Santa ðŸŽ…âœ¨

changelog.change_log:
- Fixed music not starting in some instances.
- Gifts that fall through floor will now come back into the room!
- The Shop tip that appears will now disappear after 15 seconds (previously only disappeared once you interacted with the shop).
